title: Deutsche Bank scoops four Global Custodian awards
body:
Deutsche Bank’s Alternative Fund Services (AFS) business won four awards at the Global Custodian Industry Leaders Awards 2017. The event, which took place in New York, featured several new awards, recognizing specific achievements of fund services providers in North America and a special set of Editor’s Awards focussing on corporate organisation.
Deutsche Bank picked up the award for Best Overall Performance, Private Equity Fund Administration and awards for Best Private Equity Administration – Technology, Best Hedge Fund Administration Value and Best Hedge Fund Administration – Compliance.
“We could not be more excited about our performance in this year’s awards,” said Jason Sheller, Global Head of Sales for Deutsche Bank AFS. “It is truly a testament to the people across our teams who deliver on a daily basis for their clients.”
With over US$170bn in alternative assets under administration, Deutsche Bank’s AFS provides a range of administration services to a diverse range of hedge fund and private equity clients from all regions, with services that are tailor-made to the specific and increasingly complex requirements of each client.
